    • Constructor Detail

      • MatchingGame

        public MatchingGame(PlayerProfile profile,
            EnumSet<KanaSyllable> kanaSet,
            CharacterType cType1,
            CharacterType cType2,
            int charsPerRound)
        Creates a new MatchingGame instance.
        Parameters:
        profile - The profile to change the scores of.
        kanaSet - Set of KanaSyllables to be used in the game.
        cType1 - CharacterType to match "from"
        cType2 - CharacterType to match "to"
        charsPerRound - Number of characters per round.

    • Method Detail

      • getCharacters

        public ArrayList[] getCharacters()
        Get the KanaCharacters to be used in the game.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList for each CharacterType with randomly selected syllables. The length of the lists is determined by the charsPerRound attribute.

      • matchCharacters

        public boolean matchCharacters(KanaCharacter c1,
                      KanaCharacter c2)
        Makes the match of two KanaCharacters and takes care of the scoring.
        Parameters:
        c1 -
        c2 -
        Returns:
        true if the characters match.
